javascript Axios

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The service delivery location or facility in which the vaccine was / was to be administered

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient for the vaccination record

parameters.name: performer
parameters.description: The practitioner or organization who played a role in the vaccination

parameters.name: reason-code
parameters.description: Reason why the vaccine was administered

parameters.name: series
parameters.description: The series being followed by the provider

parameters.name: status-reason
parameters.description: Reason why the vaccine was not administered

parameters.name: target-disease
parameters.description: The target disease the dose is being administered against
